channel.title: network analysis on r-tastic
channel.description: Recent content in network analysis on r-tastic

item.title: Friendships among top R-twitterers
item.description: Have you ever wondered whether the most active/popular R-twitterers are virtual friends? :) And by friends here I simply mean mutual followers on Twitter. In this post, I score and pick top 30 #rstats twitter users and analyse their Twitter friends’ network. You'll see a lot of applications of rtweet and ggraph packages, as well as a very useful twist using purrr library, so let's begin! BEFORE I START: OFF - TOPIC ON PERFECTIONISM After weeks and months (!
